name: BattleShip Single Player
description: This is the classic Battle Ship game for a single player.  Notably this version has little tweaks such as the guns all follow the mouse as you move around the screen.   When a ship it hit it generates a fireball.  Notice that the fireball does not mimic the other fireballs.  Each ball of flame is unique.   You have two options when playing this game.  Easy and Hard.   The Easy computer option means the computer is very stupid.   It just keeps randomly hitting squares in the ocean trying to hit your fleet.   The Hard computer option means the computer will go left-right-up-down from the spot where it successfully hit your fleet.  Additionally, if you ships touch each other it will find them much faster almost as if it uses a metal detector to find the next ship.   This game also features a cheating option!  You can use the radar to find your enemy's ships.
